item.title: Tesla reported weaker-than-expected earnings. Here's what analysts had to say
item.description: The company also noted that automotive revenue pulled back 8% in the fourth quarter compared to a year earlier.

item.title: DoubleLine’s Gundlach says his base case is one rate cut this year, two reductions maximum

item.title: What the Fed didn't say is what mattered to traders
item.description: The removal of a key phrase in the postmeeting statement showing inflation "has made progress toward" the 2% target raised investors' eyebrows.

item.title: Wells Fargo says this move in the bond market could mean higher future returns
